k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "..." if len(s) > k else s)  # if len(s) > k else s


# -----Answer-----

k = int(input())
s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s) 


# -----Answer-----#

k = int(input())
s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s)


k, s = input(), input()
if k >= len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')

s = input()

if k > len(s):

else:

k = int(input())
s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s) 




def main():
    k, s = input(), input()
    if k > len(s):
        print(s)
    else:
        print(s[:k] + '...')


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "..." if len(s) > k else s) 

# -----Answer-----

s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s)


k, s = int(input()), input()
if k > len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')
